traceability.evidence: 1. CLI flag parsing and validation for --prod-min-age, --dev-min-age, --prod-severity, and --dev-severity is implemented in bin/dry-aged-deps.js (lines 297–391). 2. Config file support reading prod and dev objects (config.prod.minAge/minSeverity, config.dev.minAge/minSeverity) with validation is implemented in bin/dry-aged-deps.js (lines 40–200) and tested in test/cli.config-file.test.js. 3. Dependency type detection uses package.json dependencies vs devDependencies in src/print-outdated.js (getDependencyType) and is covered by unit tests: printOutdated.prodDependency.test.js (table output for prod) and printOutdated.extra.test.js (dev fallback). 4. Default behavior (same threshold for both) is validated in test/cli.flags.test.js. 6. Validation of all threshold values (integer range 1–365, valid severity levels) is enforced and tested for general flags; similar logic applies to prod/dev flags. 7. Output indication: table header includes a "Type" column and each row ends with 'prod' or 'dev' (verified in unit tests and manual CLI run). 8. README.md and built-in help text include all prod/dev flags.
